thread.title: Don Haubert Jr
thread.title_full: Chewy.com reviewed by Don Haubert Jr

author: Don Haubert Jr
title: Don Haubert Jr
text: I tend to be one who rejects technology and e-commerce, but decided to take a chance. After going to the website, I found the products easier to locate than in a store, itself. And the prices were more than competitive. The order was easy to complete and I appreciated the email updates. The products showed up in perfect condition.... right inside my side porch door. I found a new way to shop for my cats, Handsome and Sweetheart. Excellent experience.
